message.pattern: <@DATE_TIME_ISO:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> dcc[<@NUMBER:NULL@>]: <@STRING:NULL@>: [SECEV] Request violations: <@STRING:request_violations@> support id: <@NUMBER:support_id@>, source ip: <@IP_ADDR:src_ip@>, xff ip: <@IP_ADDR:NULL@>, HTTP classifier: <@STRING:http_classifier@> request: <@STRING:request@>
